text: 4:10-11 Onger Akaba 91:11-12Egha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘A nɨ bagh uan enselba akar gavgavim me mɨkɨmtɨma me deraghvɨra nɨn ganam. Egh me uan dafaribar nɨ fueghtɨ, nɨ uan dagarim dagɨatam gaseghan kogham!’ Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ guizbangɨra Godɨn Otarim, nɨ kagh ikɨ uabɨ ekunigh.”
